gui.form.base

Interface ChangeSubject

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Button, CheckBox, DefaultCheckBox, DefaultRadioButton, DropDownMenu, FormObject, InputBox, Label, ListBox, ListBox.ListBoxElement, MenuBar, MenuHeader, MenuItem, OkButton, RadioButton, RegexCheckedInputBox

    public interface ChangeSubject
    Interface for offering services to listen for changes
    Author:
    group11
